description_nl: Voor deze Algemene Ledenvergadering (ALV) zomereditie, nodigen we jullie vanaf 15.00 graag uit op de prachtige locatie: De Eendracht Zwolle . Eerst met een officieel gedeelte, daarna met een gezellige zomerborrel en BBQ.
description_en: For this General Member Meeting (AGM) summer edition, we invite you from 15:00 at the beautiful location: De Eendracht Zwolle. First with an official part, followed by a pleasant summer drinks and BBQ.

description_nl: Yes, finally a woman in eCommerce in Groningen! Join us not only for drinks and food but also to get inspired by a panel discussion with Maria Bruin (Partner Manager at Alumio), Marianne Deenik (Head of Agency Partnerships), and Karlijn Lowik (CEO of RUMvision).
description_en: Yes, finally a woman in eCommerce in Groningen! Join us not only for drinks and food but also to get inspired by a panel discussion with Maria Bruin (Partner Manager at Alumio), Marianne Deenik (Head of Agency Partnerships), and Karlijn Lowik (CEO of RUMvision).

description_nl: Met Magento PageBuilder is zoveel meer mogelijk dan standaard geopperd door concurrenten. Met deze hackathon brengen we alle puzzelstukken samen en breiden we de boel uit
description_en: With Magento PageBuilder, so much more is possible than standard suggested by competitors. With this hackathon we bring all the puzzle pieces together and expand everything

description_nl: We're bringing developers together from around the world for a live, online hackathon! Whether you're a seasoned coder or just love building things, this is your chance to collaborate in real time, solve interesting challenges, and showcase your skills. We can make a huge affect on the Mage-OS system!
description_en: We're bringing developers together from around the world for a live, online hackathon! Whether you're a seasoned coder or just love building things, this is your chance to collaborate in real time, solve interesting challenges, and showcase your skills. We can make a huge affect on the Mage-OS system!
